Package de.mrapp.android.validation.validators.text

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeginsWithUppercaseLetterValidator
    A validator, which allows to validate text to ensure, that they begin with an uppercase letter.
    EqualValidator
    A validator, which allows to validate texts to ensure, that they are equal to the text, which is contained by an EditText widget.
    LetterOrNumberValidator
    A validator, which allows to validate texts to ensure, that they only contain letters or numbers.
    LetterValidator
    A validator, which allows to validate texts to ensure, that they only contain letters.
    MaxLengthValidator
    A validator, which allows to validate texts to ensure, that they are not longer than a specific length.
    MinLengthValidator
    A validator, which allows to validate texts to ensure, that they have at least a specific length.
    NotEmptyValidator
    A validator, which allows to validate texts to ensure, that they are not empty.
    NoWhitespaceValidator
    A validator, which allows to validate texts to ensure, that they contain no whitespace.
    NumberValidator
    A validator, which allows to validate texts to ensure, that they only contain numbers.
    RegexValidator
    A validator, which allows to validate texts to ensure, that they match certain regular expressions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Case
    Contains all case sensitivities, which may be used by validators.
